title: Numerical Methods for Engineers and Scientists 3rd c2014 Gilat
description:
Numerical Methods for Engineers and Scientists: An Introduction with Applications Using MATLAB, 3rd Edition (c2014), textbook by Amos Gilat and Vish Subramaniam.

TEXTBOOK INFO: Google these 2 keywords together: Wiley productCd-EHEP002915
(ISBN-13: 9781118554937)

CONTENTS:
---------
1. Introduction
2. Mathematical Background
3. Solving Nonlinear Equations
4. Solving a System of Linear Equations
5. Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors
6. Curve Fitting and Interpolation
7. Fourier Methods
8. Numerical Differentiation
9. Numerical Integration
10. Ordinary Differential Equations: Initial-Value Problems
11. Ordinary Differential Equations: Boundary-Value Problems
Appendix A Introductory MATLAB
Appendix B MATLAB Programs
Appendix c Derivation of the Real Discrete Fourier Transform (DFT)
(see the textbook's website above for detailed contents)

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, "extracted" PDF (42 MB); very well executed with optical character recognition, OCR, with only a few errors; downsampling used on raster objects but still good. A locked font embedding made this file twice as much heavier than it could have been but who cares when *evaluating* a textbook?

compressed (zipped): *right-click* the filename (.7z) & choose *Extract* to convert to PDF; discard the .7z file (container) when done with seeding.

INTRO TO MATLAB BY GILAT: Google "gilat-matlab-introduction-with-applications-4th-etext-t5786913.html" and go for the kickass hit.
